<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set user info for multiple users"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/bulk/set-user-info"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates user information fields for multiple users in a single asynchronous bulk operation. Enables efficient mass updates of profile data such as department, title, phone number, or custom fields.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) with entity type 'User'. Extract `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search users: [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) â†’ collect UserIds to update
2. Prepare update data: Define fields and values to set
3. Execute bulk update: POST this endpoint with UserIds and field values
4. Monitor job: Use returned BulkJobId to track progress

**Minimal Required Fields**: UserIds (array), InfoUpdates (field/value pairs)

**Notes**: Runs asynchronously and returns a BulkJobId for status tracking. Large batches may take several minutes to complete. Only fields specified in the request are updated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

Mirrors `BulkUserRequest<SetUserInfoRequest>`.","properties":{"UserIds":{"type":"array","description":"Explicit user identifiers to update when `IsSelectAll` is false.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Request":{"description":"The info updates to apply to all selected users.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Payload to update user info fields. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.SetUserInfoRequest`.","properties":{"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier. Ignored when used in bulk operations.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}},"Values":{"type":"array","description":"Field values to set. Each element is a key/value pair where the key is the field identifier.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a key/value pair serialized from .NET `KeyValuePair<string,string>`.","properties":{"Key":{"type":"string","description":"Key identifier."},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"String value."}},"title":"StringKeyValuePair"}},"RunRules":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, server-side rules run after applying the values.","default":true}},"title":"SetUserInfoRequest"}]},"IsSelectAll":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, ignores `UserIds` and applies to users matching `UsersRequest`.","default":false},"UsersRequest":{"description":"User selection criteria applied when `IsSelectAll` is true.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Query and selection options for users. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.GetUsersRequestV1`.","properties":{"Filters":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of facet filters applied to the user directory.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Universal filter structure used across all search endpoints (Tickets, Assets, Users). Each FilterMatch targets a specific facet and provides criteria through either the `Id` field (for entity references) or the `Value` field (for expressions).\n\n## Supported Entity Types\n\n| Entity | Facet Key Reference | Total Facets |\n|--------|---------------------|-------------|\n| Tickets | `TicketSearchFacetKey` | 103 |\n| Assets | `AssetSearchFacetKey` | 75 |\n| Users | `UserSearchFacetKey` | 41 |\n\n## Field Usage by Facet Type\n\n| Facet Type | Use Field | Example |\n|------------|-----------|--------|\n| Entity reference (status, agent, location) | `Id` | `{\"Facet\": \"status\", \"Id\": \"guid-here\"}` |\n| Date expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"createddate\", \"Value\": \"range:thisweek\"}` |\n| Numeric expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"purchasedprice\", \"Value\": \"numoperator:greaterthan:100\"}` |\n| Keyword search | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"keyword\", \"Value\": \"laptop\"}` |\n| Boolean facet | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"isurgent\", \"Value\": \"true\"}` |\n\n## Filter Combination Logic\n\n- **Default (AND)**: All filters are combined with AND logic\n- **OR within groups**: Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR logic\n- **Exclusion**: Set `Negative: true` to exclude matching records\n\n## Expression Syntax Reference\n\nSee `DateExpressionSyntax` and `NumericExpressionSyntax` schemas for detailed syntax documentation.\n\n## Universal Facets\n\nSix facets are shared across all search endpoints: `grade`, `location`, `locationtype`, `role`, `source`, `user`. See `UniversalFacets` schema for detailed cross-entity behavior documentation.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"The facet key identifying the filter type. Valid values depend on the entity being searched:\n- Tickets: See `TicketSearchFacetKey`\n- Assets: See `AssetSearchFacetKey`\n- Users: See `UserSearchFacetKey`\n\nRetrieve available facets via `/api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/{entityTypeId}`.","example":"status"},"FacetName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Human-readable display name for the facet. Populated by the UI when saving filters.","example":"Ticket Status"},"Name":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display label for the selected value. Populated by the UI for saved filters.","example":"Open"},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID value for entity-reference facets. Use this field when filtering by a specific entity's identifier (e.g., status ID, location ID, user ID).","example":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555"},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"String value for expression-based facets. Syntax varies by facet type:\n- Date facets: See `DateExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `range:thisweek`, `date>=01/01/2024`)\n- Numeric facets: See `NumericExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `numoperator:greaterthan:100`)\n- Keyword: Plain text search term\n- Boolean: `true` or `false`","example":"range:thisweek"},"Negative":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"When `true`, excludes records matching this filter instead of including them. Inverts the filter logic.","example":false},"GroupIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0,"description":"Groups filters for OR logic. Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR, then groups are combined with AND. Default value of 0 means all filters use AND logic.","example":0},"Selected":{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"Indicates the filter is active. Always `true` when applying filters via API.","example":true},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the custom field type when this filter targets a custom field. Used with facets like `usercustomfield`, `assetcustomfield`, or `ticketcustomfield`."},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Path identifier for complex editor configuration. Used when the filter requires a specialized UI editor component."},"SortOrder":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Sort order hint for display purposes when presenting multiple filter options."},"AggregateOperation":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"enum":["and","or"],"description":"Logical operation for aggregate filters. When set, this filter acts as a container combining `Children` filters with the specified operation. Use `and` to require all children match, `or` to match any child."},"Children":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Nested filter conditions for aggregate filters. Only used when `AggregateOperation` is set. Allows building complex nested filter expressions.","items":"circular(FilterMatch)"}},"required":["Facet"],"example":{"Facet":"status","FacetName":"Status","Name":"Open","Id":"38889bac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00001","Negative":false,"GroupIndex":0,"Selected":true},"title":"FilterMatch"}},"OnlyShowDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, returns only deleted users.","default":false},"FieldsToReturn":{"type":"array","description":"Optional list of field names to include in results.","items":{"type":"string"}},"CommandTimeout":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Optional command timeout in seconds."},"IncludeUsersDeletedSinceDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"When provided, includes users deleted since the supplied timestamp."},"ExcludeNoAccess":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, excludes users with no access.","default":false},"ClearObjectProperties":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, returns a flat user (object-type properties removed).","default":false},"IncludeDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, includes deleted users in the result set.","default":false},"Source":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Hint for where the request came from (for example, `EditRequestor`)."},"BypassIndex":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, forces a SQL query instead of eventually-consistent index results.","default":false},"RevisionDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"When provided, returns users as of the supplied revision date."}},"title":"GetUsersRequestV1"}]}},"title":"BulkSetUserInfoRequest"}}}}}

</RequestSchema>
